item.title: Diddy trial live updates: Dawn Hughes testifies in Sean Combs’s sex-trafficking case; Kid Cudi set for Thursday
item.description: Sean “Diddy” Combs’s federal sex-trafficking trial continues on Day 8, with Kid Cudi, Dawn Hughes and George Kaplan expected to testify this week.

item.title: Deal on SALT comes into focus but upsets budget hawks
Live updates: House panel continues marathon debate ahead of key vote on Trump bill
item.description: Get the latest news on President Donald Trump’s return to the White House and the Republican-led Congress.

item.title: The defense also asked Special Agent Gerard Gannon about the workers encountered by law enforcement...
The defense cross-examined Homeland Security agent Gerard Gannon about the use of an armored “SWAT-type vehicle”...
